description: It makes my apps very consistent.

The description of this app really should mention these additional steps. 
https://github.com/GradienceTeam/Gradience
If you look at the repo (link above) they describe enabling flatpak app theming. Simple override in the gradience app preference (or adding certain folders to the file system access for all files using flatseal).
summary: FLatpak apps work with extra steps

description: Gradience works as expected and is great for theming. Just works out of the box. Although for most applications to respect your theming choices you'll have to logout and login. I wish this was told to be when I applied the theme as this caused some confusion. Plus some flatpak apps simply don't respect the theme what so ever. But so far everything is great and easy to use.
Gradience is an amazing tool for customizing Adwaita at your own taste, if you like existing color palettes you can download pre-configured themes directly from Gradience!
summary: Theming Adwaita was never that easy
